title.rendered: Oslo Børs – The subscription rights in Aqualis ASA will be listed 24.06.2019

content.rendered:
Navn / Name: Aqualis TR
Ticker: AQUA T
Instrument ID: 1304835
ISIN: NO0010858566
Oppgjørstype / Clearing Type: Ikke clearing (Bilateralt oppgjør)
Tegningskurs / Issue price: NOK 3.96
Tegningsperiode / Subscription period: 24.06.2019 – 08.07.2019
Noteringsperiode / Listing period: 24.06.2019 – 04.07.2019
Segment: OBST
MIC kode: XOSL
Hjemstat / Country of register: NO – Norway
Handelsvaluta / Trading Currency: NOK
Børsstørrelse (EMS): 10 000

Tildelingsforhold i emisjonen / Ratio subscription rights: 0.21 tegningsretter per 1 eksisterende aksjer / 0.21 rights for every 1 existing shares held
Tegningsforhold i emisjonen / Subscription ratio: 1 rett gir 1 ny aksje / 1 right gives 1 new share

jetpack-related-posts.title: Terms of the underwritten rights issue
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the stock exchange announcement dated 21 May 2019 regarding the proposed underwritten rights issue (the "Rights Issue") and the private placement (the "Private Placement") in Aqualis ASA (the "Company") which is subject to approval by the extraordinary general meeting of the Company to be held on…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Commencement of the subscription period for the rights issue
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the stock exchange announcement dated 21 June 2019 in which Aqualis ASA announced that a prospectus has been approved in connection to the rights issue...

jetpack-related-posts.title: Approval and publication of the prospectus
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the stock exchange notice release on 11 June 2019 where Aqualis ASA (the "Company") announced that the annual general meeting of the Company had approved the share issues in connection with the agreement between the Company and Braemar Shipping Services plc ("Braemar")

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar announces successfully completed Private Placement
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the stock exchange notice dated 23 November 2020 regarding AqualisBraemar ASA’s (“AqualisBraemar” or the “Company”) agreement to acquire all the issued and outstanding shares in Neptune Midco 1 Limited from the ultimate parent company of the LOC Group, LOC Group Holdings Limited (the “Transaction”), the shareholders…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis and Braemar Technical to join forces
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Aqualis and Braemar Technical to join forces - forming a leading adjusting, marine, offshore and renewable consultancy

jetpack-related-posts.title: Final result of rights issue and completion of private placement
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The subscription period for the rights issue (the "Rights Issue") in AqualisBraemar ASA (the "Company") expired at 16:30 hours (CET) on 8 July 2019.
